text: One step at a timeI don t even know where to begin   This mental health crap has been such a long road for me   Over the summer I had one of my worst bouts of depression and suicidality  I cut off all communication with every friend   and even family members  I m starting to get out of it   but I m still so far from being back on my feet   I got a job recently at a fast food chain   which has been going well but I haven t been doing much of anything else besides spending time with my son when he s here  Like  I want to take classes next semester but that completely relies on getting my tuition reimbursed for the current semester  I was forced to drop classes due to being in the hospital for my mental health  I put in the request about a month ago and someone called me about it   but I can t seem to care enough to call them back  There are other things like I need to make doctors  and dentist s appointments  but I just don t care   And so it starts   I m starting to feel like a failure all over again  Yeah  getting a job was a step   but what about the rest of my life   I dunno  I guess I m partially lonely as well   Most of my friends don t live around me   and even the ones I talk to also have mental health problems or are just stuck in life and we tell each other it s ok and we understand   but in reality we both know it s not   Thanks for reading   I guess
summary: During the summer I had one of my worst bouts of depression and suicidality. I cut off all communication with every friend and even family members. I got a job recently at a fast food chain. I want to take classes next semester but that depends on getting my tuition reimbursed for the current semester. I was forced to drop classes due to being in the hospital for my mental health. I need to make doctors and dentist appointments but I just don't care.
cleaned: summer bad bout depression suicidal cut communication friend family member get job recently fast food chain want class semester depend get tuition reimburse current semester force drop class hospital mental health need doctor dentist appointment not care

text: work  in particular  and life  in general  makes me want to kill myselfit s   am where I live  I woke up with a really heavy panic attack because I had another nightmare about work  I have a long history of battling panic attacks  I have an anxiety disorder and depression  but with the help of therapy I was finally able to go month without even having one  used to have multiple ones daily   I ve started working at my workplace   month ago  It s been hell but it s important to keep on working there if I want to get into my dream job   The first day of work was also the first day in month with a panic attack  I m constantly crying at work because I m so stressed out  I feel useless  I had holidays for   weeks and have to go back now and could not enjoy even one day of them bc I got so anxious thinking about going back to work   I have to go back in a few hours  My life is overall going downhill atm and I ve never been in such a bad place before  I had plans to kill myself on New Years day but didn t carry them through  mainly because of my best friend but we got in a big fight yesterday night so he probably hates me  there s no reason to stay  if I kill myself during the next few hours I can get rid of all of my problems  it feels so right and I ve been feeling this way ever since New Years  I feel like getting rid of myself is the only right thing to do at this point  I don t have to worry about work  about all of the family drama  I don t have friends who could be sad because they all left once my depression got worse a year ago   It s all so pointless   I really want to die  I really want to do it now  I don t have any doubts  This is the only right thing to do  it s the only thing on my mind  there s nothing else   Today s the day  It s all too much   Goodbye
